alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, northwestern Wakulla, Liberty, southwestern Leon and northwestern Franklin Counties through 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/... At 142 PM EDT/1242 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of Midway to 8 miles east of Stonemill Creek to 8 miles west of Port St. Joe. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Wewahitchka, East Camp, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Eleven Mile, Jensen Place, Odena, Central City, Indian Pass, Red Hill, Clio, Overstreet and Milltown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
